summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing a loan agreement with the Washington State Department of Community Development for the design and construction of street improvements to NE Northgate Way from 15th Avenue NE to Lake City Way; accepting and depositing funds into the Transportation Improvement Fund; authorizing preconstruction and right-of-way activities; authorizing the hiring of consultants; and making an appropriation from the Transportation Improvement Fund therefor.
